headline: Will AI-Fueled Demand for HAMR Drives Rewrite Seagate Technology Holdings' (STX) Earnings Narrative?
summary: In recent months, Seagate Technology Holdings has reported stronger demand from AI-driven data centers and social media video platforms, underpinned by its HAMR-based Mozaic hard drives that deliver higher storage capacity and support margin improvement. This AI-fueled data growth is reinforcing the cost advantage of high-capacity hard disk drives over alternative storage technologies, helping position Seagate as a key supplier for cloud-scale infrastructure while the company continues...
